Synopsis: Retrieves information about Group Policy Objects (GPOs) stored in SYSVOL and NETLOGON folders.
Description: This function retrieves information about GPOs stored in SYSVOL and NETLOGON folders of specified domains. It can filter by type of files and hash algorithms used for verification.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-GPOZaurrFiles -Type 'All' -HashAlgorithm 'SHA256' -Signature
Retrieves all files from SYSVOL and NETLOGON folders with SHA256 hash algorithm and includes file signatures.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-GPOZaurrFiles -Type 'Sysvol' -HashAlgorithm 'MD5' -AsHashTable
Retrieves only SYSVOL files with MD5 hash algorithm and returns the results as a hashtable.
